subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are accepting your refinance loan request
body:
Your credit history does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$259,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://luvuiiksheap.com/
